title: A wild guess about Bandle City and Bard
body:
Ok there is no coincidence about the locations that the portals appear that are the shape of the star constellation for Bard 
 
[](https://imgur.com/a/QHvxFOV) the Bard constellation 

So what if Bard is created by the Yordles to protect them from the normal realm. And he is going after powerful objects that maaaaybe are the key for a portal to there. Since he  is not after saving the world. If he wanted that he would have went after the runes.. He definitely isn't saving the world from powerful objects as we thought before. He isn't targonian being. And the portal thingies on the map really make me think that he definitely has something to do with Bandle city..

what the fuck kinda point do you even think you're making

The crosses are the places that the Bandle City portals appear. The centre of 3 spirals composed of crosses just happens to make a roughly equilateral triangle. Bards face has 3 dots in an equilateral triangle.

I think it's just coincidence, but it is pretty damn cool.

My personal theory is that maybe Bard 'made' yordles? Or at least introduced them to our physical realm.
When seeing how the portals to Bandle City line up, I jokingly stated "Lol Bard made Yordles confirmed".

Now...if you really do think about it...that wouldn't be *too* out of character for Bard.
Maybe baby Meeps grow up into Yordles?
I like this because it means he hurls baby yordles at people when he auto-attacks.
I like where your heads at, but I dont think Bard has to do with Bandle City or yordles.

An interesting theory. I wouldn't say he is necessarily NOT after objects that could destroy the world (or universe, I feel like his scale of importance is so much larger than just Runeterra) but since Ryze is already after them and handling it, perhaps he just doesn't need to step in.

I think of Bard as more of a Cosmic force than a person with an explicit purpose. I feel like he shows up in the places he NEEDS to be and does whatever it is he needs to do to keep universal order from The End of All Things.

It's definitely possible that he has something to do with Yordles, but I doubt he exists only to serve their needs. Perhaps the Yordles themselves have a stake in Universal balance and safety and then a link with bard would come in, but I feel like Bard is more than any one race or purpose on Runeterra.
